column7: Study at the graduate level in piano; selected studies from the masterworks in piano literature. Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for the appropriate Keyboard faculty. 2 to 5 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for the appropriate Keyboard faculty.
